thread.title: Say Hello to Urban Decay’s Ultimate Unicorn Lipstick Topper
thread.title_full: Say Hello to Urban Decay’s Ultimate Unicorn Lipstick Topper

author: Kat Armstrong
title: Say Hello to Urban Decay’s Ultimate Unicorn Lipstick Topper

organizations.name: ultimate unicorn lipstick topper kat armstrong mar

text:
Kat Armstrong Mar 4, 2017 
Rainbows, glitter, and all things sparkle are having way more than just a moment. Spanning everything from rose-gold unicorn brushes to these LUSH bubble bars , unicorn-themed goods are right up there with those inspired by our mermaid friends. Urban Decay may have just topped them all, however (yes, even Too Faced’s Unicorn Tears lipstick !), with its newest collection of shimmery, sparkly, lipstick topcoats. 
The company known for its world famous Naked palette and its bold, daring colors is at it again with its Vice Special Effects topcoat ($18). Meant to be applied over your favorite lipstick, it’s a long-lasting, water resistant, intensely pigmented gloss that instantly adds a shimmery, sparkly, dramatic sheen to just about any look. 
With colors like “3rd Degree” (a golden glitter), “Bruja” (berry with gold pearl sparkles), “Litter” (iridescent sparkle), and plenty more bright blues, purples and pinks, it’s simple enough for even the most glitter-impaired among us to use with ease: It sets fast, won’t smudge off, and packs a bright and powerful punch to any color you already happen to be rocking. 
With a precision applicator, and it’s under $20 price-tag, we’re sure that we won’t be the only ones in line when it drops later this month (March 23 on the Urban Decay website , and the 31st at Sephora ). 
Will you rock sparkle lips this spring and summer? Tell us about it @BritandCo ! 
(h/t POPSUGAR , photos via Urban Decay, Stewart C. Wilson/Getty)
